description: Query sales data within a specific date range, grouped by date
sql_structure: SELECT DATE(transaction_date) as date, SUM(revenue) as revenue, COUNT(*) as transaction_count FROM sales_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '{start_date}' AND transaction_date <= '{end_date}' GROUP BY DATE(transaction_date) ORDER BY date
example_questions: Show me sales from October 1 to October 15
